name: ENG
chat.alerts.dm_not_found: Player must be on the same planet
chat.alerts.stagehand_not_found: ^red;The server does not support this chat
chat.alerts.cannot_start_two_slashes: Command cannot start with two slashes
chat.alerts.cannot_dm_server: Cannot send a DM to the server
chat.alerts.cannot_dm_command_result: Cannot send a DM to a command result
greeting.se_not_found:
Welcome to xAdvancedChat, FezzedOne's fork of Degranon's Advanced Chat for xSB-2!

This mod requires xSB-2 v2.3.7+.
https://github.com/FezzedOne/xSB-2
greeting.se_version:
Welcome to xAdvancedChat, FezzedOne's fork of Degranon's Advanced Chat for xSB-2!

Update your xSB-2 client to v2.3.7+.
https://github.com/FezzedOne/xSB-2
greeting.unbind_controls:
Welcome to xAdvancedChat, FezzedOne's fork of Degranon's Advanced Chat for xSB-2!

To begin, you need to manually unbind the following controls (Esc > Options > Controls > Game):

* Begin Chat Command
* Begin Chat
* Repeat Last Command ^gray;(use the mod bind instead)^reset;

Click Accept and you should be good to go!
greeting.unknown:
Welcome to xAdvancedChat, FezzedOne's fork of Degranon's Advanced Chat for xSB-2!

An unknown error has occurred; check ^red;xclient.log^reset;.
